title: GET_DAMAGE_CAPABILITIES Operation
description: Retrieves damage capabilities from an entity, generating blunt damage from weight if none exist

entity_ref.description: Reference to the entity. Supports entity ID string, keywords (actor/target/primary/secondary/tertiary), or JSON Logic expression.

output_variable.description: Variable name to store the resulting damage capabilities array in the execution context. The array can then be iterated with FOREACH or accessed via JSON Logic.
